extendedInfo.description: TIPS (Texts In Private Space) - Hitting the Android Market as a Free Premier AppText messaging has taken over as the most popular form of communication in the world.  Over 3,000,000,000,000 text messages will be sent this year.  What happens if someone accesses your phone with or without your permission?  Youâre right; they will be able to see all of your logged text conversations and pictures that have been sent or received.  How many of us have messages that we donât want others to read, because the texts are for our eyes only?  Probably most of us! Itâs clear, you need to be able to keep your text messages private and secured, and TIPS is the most reliable service available to do that.You can rest a little easier now!  The latest app for AndroidâTIPSâhas just hit the market. TIPS is the ultimate tool to meet your text-message privacy needs.  With TIPS, you set up an additional retrieval box, disguised as a very cleverly designed tip calculator, which no one can enter without using a private password.  The icon itself looks and operates like a tip calculator when used by others, but if you type in your private password, the screen flips over and reveals all of your private messages to you!  TIPS also offers two additional icons by using the widget feature on your phone to activate a new look and keep spying eyes away. How does it work?  Once you download the app, youâll go through a simple set-up page that will allow you to choose a password that fits your needs.  So you wonât miss hidden text or picture, the coolest feature of this app is the ability for the TIPS icon to transform itself slightly to alert you that a message has arrived and is in the secure area (see "how to" link below).  You also have the ability to set up a discrete conversation starter to alert you that a message has arrived.Whatever your reason for maintaining fully secure text messages, with TIPS you can actually keep your private messages âprivate.â  When someone asks to use or check your phone, you can hand it over with a smile, knowing that your text messages wonât get into the wrong hands!  For more info friend us on Facebook â http://www.facebook.com/tipsandroidappFollow us on Twitter â http://twitter.com/#!/TIPSANDRIODAPPOr email us at - info@TipsAndroidApp.comWidget "how to" video - http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vTcB2cA1TuM

reviews.title: How do ya use it?
reviews.comment: I dont get this thing i set it up so nxt time my mate tries to check my messages by \"borrowing my phone\" and she can still check it! I only gave it average cuz its a source of protection
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Change name
reviews.comment: App shows up in \'installed apps\' with the acronym spelled out. Gives away what it is... Get rid of the name use only TIPS
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Like
reviews.comment: Good app.  Like timeout option . Like that it works as a secondary app for what it says it does. Should defiantly be able to change full name disclosure after downloaded . Thats no bueno.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: This one works great, its simple and does exactly what its supposed to. The discrete notification and overlaid app is a good concept. Well done
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Ugh
reviews.comment: Doesn\'t download the pix anymore. Or send em. It jist keeps saying download unsuccessful. Fix it please.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Pretty good
reviews.comment: This app has been great to me. The only thing is how can get pics out of tips? If I forward it to myself it wont send
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Lg lucid
reviews.comment: For some reason i can text people feom the app ....but all reply\'s come to my message box that  everybody can see..not very secret that way
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Garbage
reviews.comment: It doesnt work on sam g3 if at all. I added every number in my contact list I could I also did it with manualky typing the numbers also manually with area code. Nothing worked I still got every text.
reviews.author: Michael Gehringer

reviews.title: Pretty Amazing
reviews.comment: This app does exactly what I need it to do. No one would ever guess what it actually is unless they went into your settings and really looked into it. However, you never need to fear that because there isn\'t anything suspicious and it\'s also a pretty handy app when it comes to figuring out percentages and tips. Even if it got into the wrong hands, you don\'t have to worry because of how it works! Really amazing!
reviews.author: Jennifer Korn

reviews.title: Useless, EPIC FAIL---
reviews.comment: App is less then useless. If you have it set up \"securely\" and you think everything is safe you\'re wrong. Go to the widgets screen after you set up your password and believe everything is \"secure\" and then put a widget on your home screen. It will actually show you what your password is and your safety email. Not just fail, EPIC FAIL.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Could be better
reviews.comment: Good app but it\'s the details that make or break it. The constant popping up of ads is annoying and it doesn\'t intercept all SMS or MMS
reviews.author: Christopher Thorne

reviews.title: Disappointed
reviews.comment: Added contacts was receiving messages. Then messages from ALL contacts went to private inbox with the entire conversation history. I couldn\'t delete them from the private contact list because they weren\'t there, just their messages in the inbox. I emailed  \"support\" address listed on the app and it\'s permanently undeliverable.  Plus...TIPS showed in the notification tray as a recently used app...come on, how many times does the average person use a tip calculator? The app is crap.
reviews.author: Lauren Pepin

reviews.title: Pretty cool, but...
reviews.comment: Great free app does what it says and will fool anyone on 1st or 2nd glance, but there are two issues. 1. When you change to one of the other icons, the function changes; not the icon itself. So it\'ll say calculator still on the icon, but when you click on it the function will be the lotto or math flash cards. May raise an eyebrow of someone inquisitive. 2. It says \"text in private\" when you go to \"your\" market apps. Dead give away of someone gets to your market.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: It\'s a great app works like it says it will. Just with it made a noise to let you know you have new messages instead if always looking at your screen.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Tips.
reviews.comment: The best... Tips ever.  Lol, wink.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great!!!
reviews.comment: Great app ...so far. Even intercepts pix. Wuld b great if it kuld hide &intercept calls. <3 plz keep working on it
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: When someone replies to what you sent through this (\"privately\"), theirs goes to regular txt inbox & is not hidden. Pointless if it doesn\'t have that feature. Also have to manually put in number, doesn\'t read your contacts. App is incomplete & a pain.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Does not work
reviews.comment: Does not intercept any texts coming through on my Samsung galaxy sll
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Worthless
reviews.comment: T.I.P.S =  This Is Pointless & Sucks
reviews.author: skee oskee

reviews.title: Awesome app
reviews.comment: Works great all the time. The changing icon widget is unique.
reviews.author: A Google User
